content.question: ​The average daily temperature, in degrees Fahrenheit <math alttext="open parentheses degree text F end text close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mo>°</mo><mtext>F</mtext></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, in a certain city can be modeled by the function <math alttext="f"><semantics><mi>f</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> given by <math alttext="f open parentheses t close parentheses equals 63.6 plus 21.9 sin open parentheses fraction numerator 2 pi over denominator 365 end fraction open parentheses t minus c close parentheses close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>63.6</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>21.9</mn><mi>sin</mi><mfenced><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>365</mn></mfrac><mfenced><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>-</mo><mi>c</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, where <math alttext="t"><semantics><mi>t</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is the number of days since the beginning of the year and <math alttext="c"><semantics><mi>c</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is a constant. January <math alttext="1"><semantics><mn>1</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> corresponds to <math alttext="t equals 1"><semantics><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. On January <math alttext="10"><semantics><mn>10</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> (<math alttext="t equals 10"><semantics><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>), the average temperature was <math alttext="41.7 degree text F end text"><semantics><mrow><mn>41.7</mn><mo>°</mo><mtext>F</mtext></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. Based on the model, what is the predicted average temperature on February <math alttext="28"><semantics><mn>28</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> (<math alttext="t equals 59"><semantics><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>59</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>) ?

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Apply numerical results in a given mathematical or applied context.
